name: notecode-app
description: NoteCode - AI Task Management with Electron Desktop Support

scripts.electron:dev: npm run build --prefix backend && concurrently "npm run dev --prefix frontend" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && cd electron && npm run dev"
scripts.electron:start: npm run build --prefix backend && cd electron && npm run dev
scripts.electron:package: npm run build && cd electron && npm run build && npm run package
scripts.electron:package:win: npm run build && cd electron && npm run build && npm run package:win
scripts.electron:package:mac: npm run build && cd electron && npm run build && npm run package:mac
scripts.electron:package:linux: npm run build && cd electron && npm run build && npm run package:linux
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix frontend" "npm run dev --prefix backend"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix backend
